name: Why We Fight (HandsomeBear Entertainment)
description:
Why We Fight is a 2d Arena-Style Shooter with a lot of vibe and action developed by the fine folks at HandsomeBear Entertainment. 

 Why should we waste time talking about it when you can play this game in your browser!

Why We Fight Discord

HandsomeBear Entertainment Discord

This is the full version of the prototype released back in April 2022,  and it was worth the wait!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys:  Move

Left Click: Shoot

Number Keys 1-5: Switch weapons

P : Pause the game

M : Mute the music

R : Restart
